1541121.title: A pool party at a super ritzy estate

choices: Nicole Daniels, chocolatey goodness
Jinny James, Redheaded cheerleader
Tina Hamasaki, Busty asian american.
15411211.content:
You're not sure exactly before you get there why one would have a pool party that starts after the sun goes down, but you think you know, once your friend is pulling into the drive of the place. You can see the shine of flood lights behind the massive house.

"Oh my gawd this place is like way upper class," you say with a lot of nervousness in your voice. "I hope my swimsuit is fancy enough."

Your friend giggles as she puts it in park and turns off the motor. "Doesn't matter to me. My friend said I could skinny dip."

You look over at her, not sure whether she's kidding or not. You have a swimsuit on under your clothes, and a dry set of undies in your bag for the drive home. She just grins back.

"Come on!" she tells you, jumping out of the car.

You follow. Since she's a lot faster, she's rung the doorbell well before you get there, and the door swings open as you arrive. Your jaw almost falls to the doormat.

The woman is a gorgeous brunette with long hair and a body like a statue, over which she is wearing absolutely nothing. "Welcome, ladies. I'll show you to the pool patio."

Three different characters for you to be. Pick the one you like.

You totally hope the guys at this thing you're going to are cute. All you have is an address and a time. Your boyfriend won't tell you a damned thing else. You figure there must be something like BDSM or Nudism going on there, the way he's being so coy about it.

What you don't think he knows is that you don't mind something that speeds the process up. After all, once he's drunk at a party, you always find some other dude and fuck him behind the BFs back. If it's something where the girls are getting naked anyway, maybe you'll finally work up the nerve to cuckold him when he's sober enough to know what's happening.
